Package org.icij.datashare.text.nlp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NlpPipeline
    Extract tokens, sentences, parts-of-speech or named entities from text Created by julien on 4/4/16.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNlpPipeline
    Common structure and behavior of NlpPipeline implementations Pipelines (models and annotators) are loaded lazily, at NlpPipeline.run(String) invocation) Created by julien on 3/29/16.
    Annotation
    Annotation on a Document consists of Tags indexed by NlpStages produced by an NlpPipeline Created by julien on 8/17/16.
    NamedEntityRecognition
    NaturalLanguageProcessing with NlpStage.NER as target stage Created by julien on 9/7/16.
    NaturalLanguageProcessing<I,O>
    Task running an NlpPipeline Created by julien on 10/6/16.
    Tag
    Tag associates a text span [begin, end[ (in characters) to an NlpStage and, optionally, a String value Created by julien on 9/14/16.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NlpPipeline.Property  
    NlpPipeline.Type  
    NlpStage
    Natural Language Processing stages: - SENTENCE sentence splitting - TOKEN tokenization - LEMMA lemmatization - POS part-of-speech tagging - NER named entity recognition Created by julien on 4/4/16.
